languages.text: "Лорд-капитан помог{mf||ла} мне {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_DamperOn}справиться{/d} с моим проклятьем, старик" — {n}холодно цедит Идира, стуча пальцами по своему пси-удушителю.{/n} "Эта штука защищает меня от варпа, а значит и вас я защитить смогу... если хорошенько попросишь".

"The Lord Captain helped me {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_DamperOn}overcome{/d} my curse, old man," {n}Idira says coldly through her teeth, and drums her fingers on her psy-stifler.{/n} "This thing here protects me from the warp, which means I can protect you as well... if you ask me nicely."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан помог{mf||ла} мне {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_DamperOn}справиться{/d} с моим проклятьем, старик" — {n}холодно цедит Идира, стуча пальцами по своему пси-удушителю.{/n} "Эта штука защищает меня от варпа, а значит и вас я защитить смогу... если хорошенько попросишь".

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Captain helped me overcome my curse, old man," {n}Idira says coldly through her teeth, and drums her fingers on her psi-stifler.{/n} "This thing here protects me from the warp, which means I can protect you as well... if you ask me nicely."

"The Lord Captain helped me overcome my curse, old man," {n}Idira says coldly through her teeth, and drums her fingers on her psi-stifler.{/n} "This thing here protects me from the warp, which means I can protect you as well... if you ask me nicely."

"The Lord Captain helped me overcome my curse, old man," {n}Idira says coldly through her teeth, and drums her fingers on her psy-stifler.{/n} "This thing here protects me from the warp, which means I can protect you as well... if you ask me nicely."

"The Lord Captain helped me overcome my curse, old man," {n}Idira says coldly through her teeth, and drums her fingers on her psy-stifler.{/n} "This thing here protects me from the warp, which means I can protect you as well... if you ask me nicely."

"The Lord Captain helped me {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_DamperOn}overcome{/d} my curse, old man," {n}Idira says coldly through her teeth, and drums her fingers on her psy-stifler.{/n} "This thing here protects me from the warp, which means I can protect you as well... if you ask me nicely."

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Lord Capitán me ayudó a superar mi maldición, anciano». {n}Idira masculla con frialdad mientras toquetea el supresor psíquico.{/n} «Esta cosita me protege de la disformidad, por lo que yo también puedo protegerlo a usted... si me lo pide por favor».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain helped me overcome my curse, old man," {n}Idira says coldly through her teeth, and drums her fingers on her psy-stifler.{/n} "This thing here protects me from the warp, which means I can protect you as well... if you ask me nicely."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Lord Capitán me ayudó a superar mi maldición, anciano». {n}Idira masculla con frialdad mientras toquetea el supresor psíquico.{/n} «Esta cosita me protege de la disformidad, por lo que yo también puedo protegerlo a usted... si me lo pide por favor».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンが力を貸してくれたおかげで、呪いは{d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_DamperOn}克服{/d}したわ、おじいさん」{n}イディラは歯を食いしばったまま冷たく言い放ち、サイ・スティフラーを指で叩く。{/n}「ここにあるこれが私を<歪み>から守ってくれる。つまり私もあなたを守ることができるということ…丁寧に頼んでくれればだけど」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain helped me {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_DamperOn}overcome{/d} my curse, old man," {n}Idira says coldly through her teeth, and drums her fingers on her psy-stifler.{/n} "This thing here protects me from the warp, which means I can protect you as well... if you ask me nicely."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンが力を貸してくれたおかげで、呪いは克服したわ、おじいさん」{n}イディラは歯を食いしばったまま冷たく言い放ち、サイ・スティフラーを指で叩く。{/n}「ここにあるこれが私を<歪み>から守ってくれる。つまり私もあなたを守ることができるということ…丁寧に頼んでくれればだけど」

languages.text: “舰长大人已经帮助我{d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_DamperOn}克服{/g}了诅咒，老家伙。”{n}伊迪拉从牙齿缝里挤出了冰冷的答复，手指敲打着她的灵能抑制器。{/n}“这个东西可以保护我免受亚空间的影响。也就是说，我是可以保护你的……只要你客客气气地求我。”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain helped me {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_DamperOn}overcome{/d} my curse, old man," {n}Idira says coldly through her teeth, and drums her fingers on her psy-stifler.{/n} "This thing here protects me from the warp, which means I can protect you as well... if you ask me nicely."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人已经帮助我克服了诅咒，老家伙。”{n}伊迪拉从牙齿缝里挤出了冰冷的答复，手指敲打着她的灵能抑制器。{/n}“这个东西可以保护我免受亚空间的影响。也就是说，我是可以保护你的……只要你客客气气地求我。”

languages.text: "Der Lord Captain hat mir geholfen, meinen Fluch zu überwinden, alter Mann"{n}, sagt Idira kalt durch zusammengepresste Zähne und trommelt dabei mit den Fingern auf ihrem Psi-Drossler herum.{/n} "Dieses Ding hier beschützt mich vor dem Warp, was bedeutet, dass ich auch Euch beschützen kann ... wenn Ihr mich nett fragt."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain helped me overcome my curse, old man," {n}Idira says coldly through her teeth, and drums her fingers on her psy-stifler.{/n} "This thing here protects me from the warp, which means I can protect you as well... if you ask me nicely."

traits.locale_text: "Der Lord Captain hat mir geholfen, meinen Fluch zu überwinden, alter Mann"{n}, sagt Idira kalt durch zusammengepresste Zähne und trommelt dabei mit den Fingern auf ihrem Psi-Drossler herum.{/n} "Dieses Ding hier beschützt mich vor dem Warp, was bedeutet, dass ich auch Euch beschützen kann ... wenn Ihr mich nett fragt."

languages.text: « Apprenez que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} m'a aidée à surmonter ma malédiction, vieil homme, {n}rétorque froidement Idira entre ses dents serrées avant de tapoter son carcan psychique du bout des doigts.{/n} Cet engin me préserve de l'influence du Warp, ce qui signifie que je peux vous en prémunir vous aussi... à condition toutefois que vous le demandiez gentiment. »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Captain helped me overcome my curse, old man," {n}Idira says coldly through her teeth, and drums her fingers on her psy-stifler.{/n} "This thing here protects me from the warp, which means I can protect you as well... if you ask me nicely."

traits.locale_text: « Apprenez que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} m'a aidée à surmonter ma malédiction, vieil homme, {n}rétorque froidement Idira entre ses dents serrées avant de tapoter son carcan psychique du bout des doigts.{/n} Cet engin me préserve de l'influence du Warp, ce qui signifie que je peux vous en prémunir vous aussi... à condition toutefois que vous le demandiez gentiment. »
